title: Re-Enactment Of Afghan Woman's Mob Killing Brings Actress To Tears
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to Leena Alam about her re-enactment of the killing of Farkhunda, a woman publicly beaten to death in March by a mob in Kabul after being falsely accused of burning a Quran.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
